js: document.addEventListener('selectstart', event => event.preventDefault()); document.getElementById('button_reset')?.addEventListener('click', () => location.reload()); const navbar = document.getElementById('main-navbar'); if (navbar) { navbar.style.top = '-2px'; } const linksToHide = ['/storage/', '/shipping_outbound/', '/']; linksToHide.forEach(href => { const link = document.querySelector(`a.dropdown-toggle[href=

]'); if (navbarBrand) { navbarBrand.removeAttribute('href'); } const headline = document.getElementById('headline'); if (headline) { headline.style.display = 'none'; } const notification = document.getElementById('notification'); if (notification) { notification.style.fontSize = '11px'; notification.style.marginTop = '-13px'; } const headerText = document.querySelector('.col-sm-5 h2'); if (headerText) { headerText.style.fontSize = '15px'; headerText.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; headerText.style.marginTop = '0px'; } const contentWrapper = document.getElementById('content-wrapper'); if (contentWrapper) { contentWrapper.style.marginTop = '-22px'; } let vibrationTriggered = false; function isAlertVisible() { const alertElement = document.querySelector('#notification .alert.alert-danger'); if (alertElement) { const style = window.getComputedStyle(alertElement); return style.visibility !== 'hidden' && style.display !== 'none'; } return false; } function triggerVibration() { if (navigator.vibrate && !vibrationTriggered) { navigator.vibrate([225, 100, 225]); vibrationTriggered = true; } } setInterval(() => { if (isAlertVisible()) { triggerVibration(); } else { vibrationTriggered = false; } }, 500);
